author: parithosh
content: I'll be creating the goerli shadow fork configs today (aiming for TTD on wednesday or thursday). Do any client teams want some validator keys for it? Its goerli, so sync times should be ~1.5h and disk requirements are ~50-100GB.

author: parithosh
content:
goerli-shadow-fork-5 configs are out: https://github.com/eth-clients/merge-testnets/tree/main/goerli-shadow-fork-5

TTD is planned to be reached on Thursday (21st July) at ~2PM UTC. The beaconchain launches on Wednesday at ~1PM UTC. 

Tooling links:
https://ethstats.goerlishadowfork5.ethdevops.io/
https://explorer.goerlishadowfork5.ethdevops.io/
https://beaconchain.goerlishadowfork5.ethdevops.io/
https://forkmon.goerlishadowfork5.ethdevops.io/

I have a bunch of spare keys in case any client team wants to join in.

author: funnygiulio
content: Do somebody have a checkpoint sync endpoint for ropsten lighthouse?
